ABOUT ME

I'm a front end developer with an eye for elegant design, and creativity in a technical capacity. My passion lies in working with a team to create memorable experiences; Bringing people's ideas to life, because at my core i'm a problem solver.

In my downtime, you'll find me woodworking, folding origami, or interior designing.
